mapper.select: select count(*) from board where ${selectbox} like '%'||#{find}||'%'
select * from (select rownum numrow, A.* from(select * from board order by b_ref desc , b_step asc) A) where numrow > 0 and numrow <= 10

mapper.update: update board set b_hit=b_hit+1 where b_seq=#{b_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( b_seq, b_id, b_name, b_email, b_title, b_content, b_date, b_ip, b_ref, b_step, b_hit, b_level, b_attach ) VALUES ( (select coalesce(max(b_seq)+1,1) from board), #{b_id}, #{b_name}, #{b_email}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_date}, #{b_ip}, (select coalesce(max(b_seq)+1,1) from board), #{b_step}, #{b_hit}, #{b_level}, #{b_attach} )
